casename: Chua Chay Lee and Others v Premier Properties Pte Ltd
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; Tan Lee Meng J; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: Thio Shen Yi and Priscilla Chang (Thio Su Mien & Partners) for the appellants; Mohan Pillay and Andre Maniam (Wong Partnership) for the respondents
tags-parsed: Contract/Breach/Repudiatory breach/Developer in agreement with apartment owners to exchange new apartments for old apartments in en bloc purchase of site/Developer delaying construction of new apartments by one year/Whether developer repudiating contract/Whether apartment owners entitled to terminate agreement
